bug.author: hecong97
bug.summary: The error when open the MLagents with Unity2019
bug.description:
Describe the bug The Unity2019pro can't open the project To Reproduce
download the "ml-agents-latest_release" Open with Unity 2019 See error"Library\PackageCache\com.unity.barracuda@0.7.1-preview\Barracuda\Runtime\Plugins\Burst\BurstBLAS.cs(8,12): error CS0246: The type or namespace name 'AlwaysLinkAssemblyAttribute' could not be found"
"Library\PackageCache\<denchmark-link:mailto:com.unity.barracuda@0.7.1-preview>com.unity.barracuda@0.7.1-preview</denchmark-link> \Barracuda\Runtime\Plugins\Burst\BurstBLAS.cs(8,12): error CS0246: The type or namespace name 'AlwaysLinkAssemblyAttribute' could not be found (are you missing a using directive or an assembly reference?)" "Library\PackageCache\<denchmark-link:mailto:com.unity.package-validation-suite@0.7.15-preview>com.unity.package-validation-suite@0.7.15-preview</denchmark-link> \Editor\ValidationSuite\ValidationTests\UpdateConfigurationValidation.cs(53,68): error CS0117: 'CompilationPipeline' does not contain a definition for 'GetPrecompiledAssemblyPaths'"
<denchmark-link:https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/15817922/83586638-92c47680-a57f-11ea-9001-b2312ed3315e.png></denchmark-link>
Environment (please complete the following information):
Unity Version: [Unity 2019.1.0a8] OS + version: [Windows 10] ML-Agents version: ( latest develop branch from source)

comments.comment: I changed to the Unity 2018.4.17f and the problem is solved

Currently, 2018.4 is the official version supported by ML-Agents. Additionally, I see you're using develop. We have changed our gitflow and develop is no longer maintained. Our leading edge is master. We encourage you to use our official releases (or master to try new features before they are released). Closing this for now.
For bookkeeping, would you mind letting us know which project you were trying to load? Are you trying to load DevProject?
No,I just try to open the "Project" Folder with Unity as the Guide describe.
